Articles.Content:
Using the brilliant Kerbal Konstructs, I've been modeling and importing terrain to use as bases and testing routes for my craft. One of which, a cliffside road:

![E7ot95B.png](http://i.imgur.com/E7ot95B.png)

Maybe I'll release some once I get better at this..

![g36fDFT.png](http://i.imgur.com/g36fDFT.png)

Pro Tip: Don't drive close to the edge ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-27T06:34:45Z" title="07/27/2015 06:34  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 27, 2015</time> by RixKillian**
